info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:28PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Siskiyou County through 700 PM PDT... At 627 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highway 97 Grass Lake And Mount Hebron, or 21 miles east of Yreka, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Mountain Snow Park and Highway 97 Grass Lake And Mount Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
